hero.title: About Steffi Haberstock
hero.subtitle: Leadership Coach | Team Developer | Mental Health Advocate

intro.title: My Journey
intro.content: With over 15 years of experience in organizational development and leadership coaching, I've dedicated my career to helping individuals and teams unlock their full potential while maintaining their well-being.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.content: To create workplaces where high performance and human connection coexist, where leaders inspire through empathy, and where teams thrive through trust and collaboration.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: Being genuine and true in all interactions

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: Understanding and connecting with others' experiences

experience.title: Professional Background
experience.description: My expertise spans across various industries and organizational cultures, bringing a unique perspective to each engagement.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: I believe in evidence-based practices combined with deep human understanding. My methodology integrates the latest research in neuroscience, psychology, and organizational behavior.

cta.title: Let's Connect
cta.description: Ready to explore how we can work together?
